meanings.sent1: The blokes at the pub were cheering for their favorite team.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of blokes playing football in the park.
meanings.sent3: The blokes decided to have a friendly competition to see who could eat the most hot dogs.
meanings.sent4: In the old western movie, the blokes rode into town on their horses, ready for a showdown.
meanings.sent5: The blokes in the fishing boat laughed and joked as they reeled in their big catch.

meanings.sent1: The blokes in the office always went out for lunch together.
meanings.sent2: The blokes in the neighborhood organized a charity event for the community.
meanings.sent3: The blokes formed a band and rocked the stage at the local music festival.
meanings.sent4: The blokes on the construction site worked together to finish the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent5: The blokes in the army trained hard to defend their country.
